MASTER.GUNY_WELCOME: Hey! Scan my QR Code to join.

NOTICE.TITLE: User Guide
NOTICE.INTRO_1: Dive into a playful and immersive experience where you explore money creation, economics, and their impacts based on the types of money you choose.
NOTICE.INTRO_2: Compare the effects of your decisions and discover the complex workings of the economic system in an engaging and interactive way.
NOTICE.INTRO_3: Each game allows you to experiment with unique scenarios while learning to master monetary dynamics in an engaging and fun way.
NOTICE.INTRO_4: A game designed to awaken your curiosity and stimulate your thinking about economics while entertaining you.
NOTICE.GOAL_1: The goal is to simulate two monetary systems, one in debt money and the other in free money.
NOTICE.GOAL_2: Depending on the type of money used, economic dynamics and exchange opportunities will evolve, adding a unique strategic dimension to each game.
NOTICE.GOAL_3: A game lasts about 20 to 25 minutes per money type.
NOTICE.GOAL_4: (so in total, 40 to 50 minutes, plus discussion time)
NOTICE.GOAL_5: These two games are therefore useful for comparing results between them, highlighting their differences and what they allowed to do collectively or not.
NOTICE.GOAL_6: Each player must maximize their economic values (resources and money) within the allotted time.
NOTICE.GOAL_7: To achieve this, each player has money and resource cards that they can buy or sell to other participants.
NOTICE.GOAL_8: The challenge is to assemble squares of 4 identical cards, then transform them into higher value cards to increase your resources. You can then resell your production.
NOTICE.SETUP_1: The animator creates the game, a QR code is created to help players join the game
NOTICE.SETUP_2: New players are invited to create an avatar upon arrival.
NOTICE.SETUP_3: (The hair color will be your color on the results graph, so don't hesitate to be 'colorful' :)
NOTICE.SETUP_4: At the start of the game, each player receives 4 resource cards of low economic value, drawn at random.
NOTICE.SETUP_5: There are 4 levels of value (food, knowledge, energy, technology) and each card has a price associated with its value level. These prices per level are visible from the game creation screen. The price of each card is also reminded on the back.
NOTICE.SETUP_6: In free money, the first Universal Dividend (U.D) is paid at the very beginning of the game and automatically every minute.
NOTICE.SETUP_7: In Debt Money, the animator or another person must play the role of the banker.
NOTICE.SETUP_8: No money is paid automatically, you need to take out a loan from the bank to have money, before the start of the round and as needed during the game.
NOTICE.SETUP_9: The loan must be fully repaid every 5 minutes from its contraction (or at the start of the game), or extended by paying interest.
NOTICE.SETUP_10: for more details, see the paragraph: The bank and the role of the banker.
NOTICE.SELL_1: Click on the card you want to sell.
NOTICE.SELL_2: It turns over, a QR code appears.
NOTICE.SELL_3: A small "ShortCode" in the middle is generated (code only valid when visible).
NOTICE.SELL_4: Show this QR code or the 3 digits to your buyer.
NOTICE.BUY_1: Click "Buy" at the bottom right of your screen.
NOTICE.BUY_2: (If the button is disabled, it means the game hasn't started yet or is already over)
NOTICE.BUY_3: Two ways to buy a card:
NOTICE.BUY_5: By clicking buy, the camera activates and you can scan the QR code of the desired card on the seller's screen.
NOTICE.BUY_7: Disable the camera next to the buy button.
NOTICE.BUY_8: By clicking buy, a keyboard appears and you can enter the code that is written in the middle of the QR code of your seller's card.
NOTICE.PROD_1: At the corner of the card appears the number of identical and stacked cards you have in your possession.
NOTICE.PROD_2: These cards can be sold, like all others, but one by one.
NOTICE.PROD_3: Once the count is reached (usually 4), a button appears to build and get your higher value card as follows:
NOTICE.TITLE_BANK: The bank and the role of the banker
NOTICE.BANK_1: To access Bank features (only in debt money), simply click the "Bank" button from the main view to start or stop a game.
NOTICE.BANK_2: The Bank requires a "full-time" person (often the animator) to grant and manage player loans, know the money in circulation, accordingly adjust interest rates and seizures in case of payment default.
NOTICE.BANK_3: The bank has economic indicators to facilitate the banker's role.
NOTICE.BANK_5: For good game operation, it's interesting to maintain at least an average of 2‚Ç¨ per player.
NOTICE.BANK_6: In case of recession, it's quite possible to make a call and offer players low rates, even 0% interest exceptionally, to bring up the average per player.
NOTICE.BANK_8: From the "Bank" view, click the "Grant a loan" button: a dialog appears to enter loan parameters (loan and interest) and the requesting person.
NOTICE.BANK_9: A loan has a 5-minute maturity from contracting.
NOTICE.BANK_10: When this maturity is reached, the player is asked to repay or extend the loan.
NOTICE.BANK_12: If the player wishes or has no choice, they can extend it for 5 minutes by paying the contracted interest.
NOTICE.BANK_13: A new 5-minute maturity will be applied.
NOTICE.BANK_15: At maturity of the allotted time, if the player can no longer pay the interest, they are asked to see the bank.
NOTICE.BANK_16: The banker sees the loan concerning the player in payment default.
NOTICE.BANK_17: A seizure is made on assets (cards and money) to repay the loan, a discount is applied to the seizure.
NOTICE.BANK_18: If unable to fully repay with the cards, the banker is obliged to set a prison term.
NOTICE.BANK_19: This duration is between 1 and 5 minutes maximum, depending on severity.
NOTICE.BANK_20: For game immersion, the player must be excluded to a corner of the room.
NOTICE.DEATH_1: Death is also part of the simulation
NOTICE.DEATH_2: Every 4 minutes a victim is chosen at random, if it's you, you'll be invited to create a new character right away. The idea is to simulate the impact of an amount of money not transmitted
NOTICE.DEATH_3: Your results will be well accumulated, with your second life for the statistics at the end of the game. Normally everyone goes through it ;)
NOTICE.FOOTER_1: If a card is missing or if a bug appears, report it to the animator.
NOTICE.FOOTER_2: Click on the money token ü™ô at the top left to refresh the page. Usually, this should "clean up" the bug üêû.

BANK.TITLE: Bank
BANK.AVG_NOTICE:
A minimum ratio of 2 is recommended to maintain, below that a recession crisis occurs.
 To get out of it, you can maybe make temporary offers of lower rates,
 see when the crisis is too severe, make 0% rates for example.
BANK.SOLUTION: (If the player doesn't see their loan, refresh their page! üòâ )
